title: Display committee name near logo and fix Jaunpur spelling

requirements.text: In the Header component, display the committee name text next to/below the logo on the left side of the header, so it is visible alongside the logo branding.

quotes: कमिटी का नाम लेफ्ट साइड में ऊपर लोगो के पास भी लिखे

acceptanceCriteria: The committee name is rendered in the header, adjacent to (beside or below) the logo on the left side
The committee name is visible on both desktop and mobile layouts
Existing logo and navigation functionality remain unchanged

requirements.text: Replace all occurrences of 'जैनपुर' with 'जौनपुर' across all frontend files, including Header, Footer, HeroSection, ContactSection, index.html, and any other component or config file where this text appears.
acceptanceCriteria: No instance of 'जैनपुर' remains anywhere in the frontend source files
The page title in index.html is also updated if it contains 'जैनपुर'

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or frontend/src/components/ui
nonGoals: Changing the committee logo or any imagery
Modifying backend data or Motoko files
Any other UI/UX changes beyond the two specified
